H0.text: They both have rocky surfaces is the characteristic that the Moon and Earth share.

H1.text: They both have active volcanoes is a characteristic shared by the Moon and Earth.

H2.text: They both have similar atmospheres, which is the characteristic that the Moon and Earth share.

H3.text: They both have the same gravitational pull is the characteristic that the Moon and Earth share.

A4.text: The Moon is a differentiated and terrestrial, with only a minuscule hydrosphere, atmosphere, and magnetic field.

A5.text: The Moon has an atmosphere consisting of only an exosphere, which is so tenuous as to be nearly vacuum, with a total mass of less than 10 tonnes (9.8 long tons; 11 short tons).
